page.title: 07Clubs of Magor
page.content: There are a lot of clubs in Magor,such as the Magor Maidens.The Magor Maidens are one of the only women's Rugby clubs in Britain.The Magor Maidens are a good team and have played English clubs.Last year a team came over from the U.S.A to play the Magor Maidens.And they later went to America to do a return visit. For the young in Magor there are many branches of the scouting movement to join such as Beavers,Cubs,Scouts,Spartan Scouts,Brownies and Guides.Spartans are very popular because they do alot of activities like waterskiing sometimes clay pigeon shooting and swimming and other sports. In the School Hall many clubs meet. Yoga and keepfit for adults and gym for the young.For the less energetic there is a flower arranging class.
